name: RPS Fight
description:
A fight mechanic that use RPS as the theme.

This game is for Weekly Game Jam week 154 with the theme Rock-Paper-Scissor

---CREDIT---

I took some art and music from some source, the license is permitting me for joining Weekly Game Jam as per rule. Here's the link for those cool people that makes them :

- Art -

by rvros : https://rvros.itch.io/animated-pixel-hero

by Elthen : https://elthen.itch.io/2d-pixel-art-minotaur-sprites

by NicoleMarieT : https://nicolemariet.itch.io/pixel-heart-animation-32x32-16x16-freebie

by raou : https://raou.itch.io/free-dungeon-mini-tileset

- Music -
